review_title: Love everything about these! Great company too.
reviews: I love this company! And these glasses! I ordered a pair and they were delivered fast and looked identical to the photos however they were crooked, so I wrote a review about it. The company contacted me the same day apologizing for how shipping can cause this and explained how i could fix them. They sent a link to a video that actually worked! And also offered to send me a brand new pair. I received the new pair today after only 3 days and they're perfect. I now have 2 pairs of sunglasses I LOVE and they both came with a year warranty. This company is amazing. Lovelovelove.
product_name: Carfia Round Polarized Sunglasses for Women UV400 Protection Lens Acetate Frame

reviews:
November 2019 (5/5) : The seller emailed me regarding my review. They offered to send me a new pair of glasses that were bigger in case they were more to my liking. I accepted on the condition that my review was going to reflect their product and if I was unhappy I would say just that. They replied that was fine with them and said they were just trying to do their part to provide good customer service. Well, the sunglasses came and they are great. The change from 48mm to 52mm resolved the glare problem. They are chic and modern pair of polarized sunglasses.

December 2018 (reviewed 2/5): The tint was good, and the overall quality was fine. I wouldnt say they have the feel of something expensive or feel like luxury sunglasses but they were durable and didnt appear cheap. They were small and therefore there was glare from the sun that made seeing in the sun hard - which is sort of the point of sunglasses.
product_name: Carfia Round Polarized Sunglasses for Women UV400 Protection Lens Acetate Frame

reviews:
Awesome sunglasses for the price! They are great quality and the lenses are polarized. I would say they definitely are comparable to my 200$ RayBans. If you‚Äôre on the fence about buying these shades, go for it. You won‚Äôt regret it!

Editing to add how amazing the customer service is: I bought a pair of sunglasses about a year ago, and noticed the lenses are a bit scratched and have some very fine cracks in them. I emailed carfia‚Äôs customer service, and they were so helpful and sent me a new pair right away! I was shocked. I will recommend this brand 100 times over.
product_name: Carfia Round Polarized Sunglasses for Women UV400 Protection Lens Acetate Frame
